title: To all those who fantasize Jinx getting bigger cleavage from Lulu's Hugify, you must know
body:
[](http://orig15.deviantart.net/00dc/f/2015/234/0/c/jinx_by_krakenkatz-d96p5fx.jpg)
0 x Any number = 0
http://reelgoodtime.weebly.com/uploads/2/6/5/6/26569731/539947_orig.gif
That's how the rules work

replies.body:
https://uproxx.files.wordpress.com/2014/08/colbert-calculator.gif?w=650

**WAIT**

Lulu does Magic... And has the mind of a young girl 

She doesn't use multiplication 

She uses Addition
While that is true the game mechanic uses multiplication, but in any other case you would be right so... http://img.pandawhale.com/post-50334-well-played-gif-Imgur-meme-jay-mkAw.gif
Why thank you
Nah, that would be if we merged her with Sona
There we go, must have misplaced a decimal

http://orig15.deviantart.net/00dc/f/2015/234/0/c/jinx_by_krakenkatz-d96p5fx.jpg

The picture you clicked for.

Why is everyone ignoring the fact that Jinx has completely eviscerated Tibbers and is resting in his fluff _while he is still alive and clearly in pain?_

Not to mention she is wearing Annie's headband, which prompts me to ask what happened to Annie?

I have just 1 word to explain what happened to Annie


Shadbase
I want everyone to know that is a website with pornographic art
What? _hovers over to address bar_ That's AWFUL! _begins to type in the website_ What kind of perverts would look at something like this? _Immediately begins typing in Leona x Diana_
You. I like you

>Shadbase

Careful with that. The mods here really needs to grow a set of balls, as they can't even take Google search words, with no posted images, links or even vague descriptions included...

So beware, as even posting words _suggesting_ pornographic content is too much for them.

----

>Hello PaladinNO,

>We do not allow the posting of any mature content of any means. This includes:
-Discussion

>Due to the mature content posted, your account has been given a warning.

{{champion:12}} dung!

@ Dear "anonymous" (instead of a more honest word!) moderator: please...don't be douche.

No mature content _were_ discussed. I wrote "Google "Leona x Diana"" and with an search optional parameter, and that's it. No discussion intended; no recommendation or even suggestion of people actually doing it - it was just a factual statement; simple infomation, as it IS a legal and valid search parameter for Google. 

I can write "Ahri", and still consider it pornographic content given her character. Annie = lolicon, new Taric splash art = bare skin [shudders], and both thus highly pornographic, and the former even highly illegal. All depending on whatever context your imagination want it to be.

Fishboner is not pleased.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
Yeah. I can easily see why they would ban for posting porn, but just a few hints and nudges seems like a non-offense to me

Yeah, it's not like I encouraged people to follow it, or even directly stated what was there - more like attempting to pique their imagination as to what they might expect to see, if they were interested in that sort of thing. :/

If they might not like it, they shouldn't do it - simple as that.

--------
YOU HEAR THAT, EVERYONE? DON'T SEARCH FOR PORN IF YOU DON'T LIKE IT!!
--------

_I was eating a cookie while receiving the above message, and suddenly I lost all appetite for it..._ :'(
RIP Cookie

http://ecommercers.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/3603_cookie-law-rip.jpg

"I used to like cookies, but then I met a Board mod."
http://images6.fanpop.com/image/photos/37600000/Ruby-eating-cookies-rwby-ruby-37663896-960-720.gif

"Such haunting of past memories; the cruelty of reliving visions and actions long since gone."

I think I could be {{item:3070}} {{champion:92}} 

But...but wouldn't posting cookie snuff provoke the mods!? :O 
They are quite sensitive, you know.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}} 

_And with that; UP YOU GO!_ ^

Btw., I saw the relation of "ShadBase" and "Leona x Diana" written above...I dunno, but my guess is that would be considered a discussion. I found the suggestions highly intriguing and...invigorating myself, I must say.

I was more referring to the "What happened to Annie?" question

Just find the one involving Jinx and Annie. that's what happened

My bad, I phrased that very badly. I was referring to the _search word_  "Leona x Diana" (mod, you readin' this...?) posted by the senpai. In correlation with the _expression_ "Shadbase", that should amount to the definition of a discussion if the above event is anything to go by.

_Sorry, but I still am quite butthurt from the mod's spanking, and with a strong feeling of unfair treatment._

But on the bright side, I eventually managed to finish my cookie.
I got a week suspension last week for voicing my opinion that Dynamic QQ threads are all spam at this point. Unfairness is real.
http://cammymay.com/day/wp-content/uploads/2012/09/animated-stinker.gif
Now that I look at it, those proportions are really weird. Her thighs are longer than her torso+head.
Looks like Jinx if she was in Overwatch.
spotted the eternal tracer bumhurt {{champion:96}}
I'm not bumhurt, but you can't deny those bitches look like they on stilts

fair enough
not zarya or ana tho ;; {{champion:96}}

"Ooh, la la! Où as-tu été toute ma vie?"

~  http://loldb.gameguyz.com/images/skins_big_skin_fid_path/veigar-superb-villain.jpg

_I hope Google didn't betray me with that french bit._ xD

I'm guessing "Where have you been all my life?"

Because Google said "Or have you been all my life?"

this french was wrong

it should have been où don't forget the accent godamn it!

Corrected. Thank you. :)
_Not my fault - I did a pure copy-paste._

Though perhaps I should change the Veigar too.

http://pre08.deviantart.net/ab13/th/pre/i/2013/279/d/6/ziggs_lol_art_collab_by_darkness423-d6pj7pj.png

http://pre10.deviantart.net/9250/th/pre/i/2015/057/8/0/aram_adventures__let_s_have_a_blast__by_farahboom-d8jm2cy.jpg

...but then the French would look out of place.
Which language would Ziggs speak? Italian? German? Or something more exotic?

_Making complicated (linguistical/socially interactive) jokes really isn't easy._ :/
I like to think German. Something about Germans and Bombs just feels RIght
Germans aren`t as big on bombs as, say, the Russians and Americans are, just saying :P
Completely agreed. It's just my "Mad Scientist" visual in my head
Well Imean they have Nuke-devouring Kaiju, I think they got some good Disposal methods
I ment as in bombs get dropped in japan and they are "disposed of" along with lots of land
I know. I was making a sub-joke of your joke

https://m.popkey.co/1c6231/bX7Eo.gif

http://24.media.tumblr.com/8e37e6c7082fe30fbe985ee7d7550400/tumblr_ml7e89DRWq1r7sku3o6_250.gif
{{champion:36}}  SOMEONE SAY CLEAVAGE?!
Lol, Silly Mundo, wrong kind of cleavage XD

But...Lulu's Hugify ADDS health not  multiplies it. 


YOUR ARGUMENT IS VOID!!!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
No it's not, I don't see Cho'gath
I want Taric to have bigger man cleavage. And bulges.
You mean...bigger gems, right?
Clickbait?...yup clickbait
That thumbnail is just disturbing

I've seen worse. ^^ 
_At least she had clothes in that version of the picture._

Also:
https://www.techinasia.com/china-creates-a-breast-size-ranking-for-all-39-female-league-of-legends-champions

>Jinx: An atrociously flat land, but if hers were bigger, it be harder for her to evade capture. Right?

I am still contemplating whether or not it is a good thing that my main is [listed at the absolute back](http://images.17173.com/2015/news/2015/05/26/lzy0526lol01.jpg) of that list. She may be purple, but she's also...flat.
